trends: There have been 52 other sightings in Myrtle Beach
There were no other sightings in Myrtle Beach on or around May 12th 2011
divs: sighting detailswe are staying at the admiral inn in myrtle beach. last night at about 30 to 35 degrees over the ocean, i saw an orange light appear in the sky for just a few seconds. when it faded two more of these lights appeared on either side of where the original was. at the time i attributed the on\off to possible clouds. i really think they were lower than any cloud cover would have been. about 10 minutes later, they re-appeared suddenly farther north along the coast. after a few seconds they were gone. 1. standing on my balcony 2. sudden bright light 3.never have seen anything like it 5. during was holy f..k what is that? after just confusion trying to explain it as anything. my wife was on the balcony with me and looked uo where i was pointing. she missed the original light but saw the two when it faded and the one farther north.
Summary: Orange lights in the sky over ocean.
